short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MediaHQ Discover: Simplifying media outreach by identifying authors for pitching and contact management in a browser extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MediaHQ Discover offers access to a extensive database, verify authors, and effortlessly manage your contact lists. Request new contacts, add to lists, and streamline your press release distribution. Enhance your media relations with MediaHQ Discover.
